name: Shui
description:
When humans realize the danger about running out of water, they ask for the Lake Spirit's help, she then, sends Shui in this mission to find out what is happening and try to save these humans lives.

Instructions:

1) Click the pipe you want to use for it to appear on the "map"

2) Drag and drop it where you want it to be.

3) Drag and drop Shui to the start point (the red pipe) and let it go.
